TestScenario: Login with correct Admin credentials
ExpectedResult: User redirected to Admin Dashboard

TestScenario: Login with correct Waiter credentials
ExpectedResult: User redirected to Floor Map

TestScenario: Login with incorrect password
ExpectedResult: Error message "Invalid login credentials" shown

TestScenario: Login with non-existent username
ExpectedResult: Error message "Invalid login credentials" shown

TestScenario: Waiter trying to access Admin Dashboard
ExpectedResult: Admin view remains hidden or unauthorized

TestScenario: Select empty table and add items
ExpectedResult: Table status changes to Occupied (Red)

TestScenario: Add Half portion of item with inventory
ExpectedResult: Stock count reduced by 0.5 units

TestScenario: Add Quarter portion of item with inventory
ExpectedResult: Stock count reduced by 0.25 units

TestScenario: Add item till stock count reaches zero
ExpectedResult: Item marked as SOLD OUT and disabled

TestScenario: Try adding more than available stock to cart
ExpectedResult: Alert "Out of Stock" prevents adding

TestScenario: Enter zero or negative price for menu item
ExpectedResult: Validation error or blocked submission

TestScenario: Add special note to order item
ExpectedResult: Note visible in KDS and Admin order view

TestScenario: Add extremely long note (200+ chars)
ExpectedResult: Note wraps correctly and is readable in KDS

TestScenario: Start two separate parcels for Table 0
ExpectedResult: Two distinct Parcel IDs (1 and 2) created

TestScenario: Close shop and reopen
ExpectedResult: Parcel numbering resets to #1 for new orders

TestScenario: Cancel out of Parcel Management modal
ExpectedResult: User returned to floor map without creating order

TestScenario: Place new order as waiter
ExpectedResult: Order card appears in KDS in real-time

TestScenario: Mark single item as Served in KDS
ExpectedResult: Item status updates to Served in Waiter/Admin view

TestScenario: Mark all items in a card as served
ExpectedResult: Entire order card is cleared from KDS

TestScenario: Admin creates a new Kitchen user
ExpectedResult: User can log in and see only Kitchen View

TestScenario: Register with an existing username
ExpectedResult: Error "Username already taken" shown

TestScenario: Cancel order with tracked items
ExpectedResult: Stock count increased by original order quantity

TestScenario: Remove a single item from an active order
ExpectedResult: Item stock is returned based on its weight

TestScenario: Add items with 5% tax rate
ExpectedResult: Final total matches (Subtotal * 1.05)

TestScenario: Mark order as Paid
ExpectedResult: Order status changes to 'paid' and seat becomes 'available'

TestScenario: Try placing order when shop is closed
ExpectedResult: Alert "Shop Closed" prevents order placement

TestScenario: Try placing order with No Internet
ExpectedResult: App shows error or retry logic for database failure

TestScenario: Admin updates price of an item
ExpectedResult: Updated price reflects immediately in menu

TestScenario: Delete category with active menu items
ExpectedResult: System prevents deletion or handles orphaned items

TestScenario: View daily sales report
ExpectedResult: Total revenue accurately sums completed orders
